headline: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC) Anticipates Europe Growth Even After Ukraine, Russia Cease Hostilities
summary: Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) is among the 10 Best Drone Stocks to Buy Right Now. On November 18, Matthew Akers, an analyst at BNP Paribas Exane, initiated coverage of the stock on a bullish note, assigning an Outperform rating and a price target of $710.
